bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of vomiting phlegm-like sputum of a jade-green color. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tong qing 銅青 quotes Jing yan fang 經驗方 : 碧琳丹治痰涎潮盛，卒中不語…吐出青碧涎 , 瀉下惡物 , 大 效 , “The virid-jade-elixir serves to treat a profuse emergence of phlegm and saliva, sudden stroke and an inability to speak…when [patients] spit jade-green saliva , and if through outflow they discharge malign stuff, it is greatly effective”.
